A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film does what an 'act two' second film in a trilogy should do- breaks expectations\, characters\, and establishes the base for success in the next film. Really great character arc for Luke and Rey. 1 star lost for a mid-movie story-line (Cantobite/parking infringement) that doesn't go anywhere and is inconsequential... hard to watch in an otherwise well but together film.
